Text: Endless Forms Most Beautiful (album):  It was released on March 27, 2015 in Argentina and most of Europe, March 30 in the UK, and March 31 in the US.

<Text: Endless Forms Most Beautiful (album):  It was recorded without drummer Jukka Nevalainen, who took a break from the band due to severe insomnia.>

<Text: Endless Forms Most Beautiful (album):  The album includes only five Nightwish members, despite its being their first album release as a sextet.>
